attributes.action: Reviewing the levels of abuse in Football through all mediums
attributes.additional_details:
I am fed up of people bringing this game into disrepute, showing a lack of a due care to those who have suffered from unfortunate incidents.

I want the government to review these inflammatory chants into the same category as Sectarian and Racist abuse. We need to eliminate the element of society to re-educate our future fans.

Any abusive messages to anybody involved in sport to result in a ban from all football stadiums and laws to bring in lists of identified abusers through sports team to ensure these people are not affected again
